name: Juggernaut
description: The caster becomes a nearly unstoppable engine of melee destruction. He or she gains a bonus of 5 plus one per 2 War Wizard levels to Strength, a 4 per War Wizard level bonus to Attack, a 8 per War Wizard level bonus to Damage, and gains immunity to Immobilization. While Juggernaut is active, the caster suffers a 30 percent Spell Failure penalty.  The effect lasts for 2 rounds plus one per 3 War Wizard levels.

upgrades.description: With Destroyer, all of your attacks do an additional 1 to 2 damage per War Wizard level.  The pure force damage from this ability cannot be resisted.
